mapper.insert: insert into t_sms (id, member_name, mobile, sms_type_id, sms_content, plan_time, send_time, status, create_time, update_time, create_id, update_id, send_level, source_code, is_deleted, failure_reason, sms_send_flag) values (#{id}, #{memberName}, #{mobile}, #{smsTypeId}, #{smsContent}, #{planTime}, #{sendTime}, #{status}, now(), #{updateTime}, #{createId}, #{updateId}, #{sendLevel}, #{sourceCode}, 'n', #{failureReason}, #{smsSendFlag})
mapper.update: update t_sms set member_name = #{memberName}, mobile = #{mobile}, sms_type_id = #{smsTypeId}, sms_content = #{smsContent}, plan_time = #{planTime}, send_time = #{sendTime}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_id = #{createId}, update_id = #{updateId}, send_level = #{sendLevel}, source_code = #{sourceCode}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, failure_reason = #{failureReason}, sms_send_flag = #{smsSendFlag} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, member_name, mobile, sms_type_id, sms_content, plan_time, send_time, status, create_time, update_time, create_id, update_id, send_level, source_code, is_deleted, failure_reason, sms_send_flag from t_sms where ID = #{id}
